name: Potatoery
description:
There is something that it's like to be a potato.

Play fullscreen (button is on the bottom right).

Space to send a root (and stop). Left/Right or A/D to vaguely steer.

Points for roots and nutrients (green).

R to reload.

Credits

A Global Game Jam 2023 game by Michael, Aaron, and Adam.

Potato by edikm1 on Turbosquid.com.

Font by GemFonts on Dafont.com.
